attributes.action: ENSURE THAT THE CHILDREN OF THE LONDON BOROUGH OF HARINGEY HAVE PROPER PROTECTION FROM ABUSE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN THE AFTERMATH OF BABY P's DEATH IT WAS AN OUTRAGE TO SEE THE PRIME MINISTER OF THIS COUNTRY PLAYING PARTY POLOTICS WITH A BABY'S DEATH. HE SHOULD GET OFF HIS FAT BACKSIDE AND SORT OUT THIS ROTTEN BOROUGH

rejection.details:
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
